description:
Art Fundamentals: Digital Art Tools Essentials covers the core knowledge you need to know in order to utilise digital art software to create artwork digitally. Most digital art software share a number of core features, and using Adobe Photoshop as a base, this course will get you up to speed on the tools and the techniques of digital art creation. If you're new to digital art, and want to learn how to draw and paint in digital art software, this course is for you.

Master The Essentials Needed to Draw and Paint In Digital Art Software

  • Understand both the hardware and software required to create digital art
  • Learn the core features of digital art software, and how to use them
  • Get to grips with the digital canvas, navigation, colour panels, tools and more
  • Gain insight into brushes, layers, and basic layer modes

Get Started Today, and Start Drawing and Painting Digitally

If you've never used digital art software before and you'd love to learn, we'd love to teach you. Getting to grips with art software and the digital art process is easier than you think, and when you're done, you should be able to approach most modern digital art packages with confidence.

Many of the features of art software are shared, such as brushes, selections, layers, colour panels, swatches, and much more. In this easy to follow course, we go step-by-step into the digital process - from what hardware tools you'll need, to creating a digital canvas and using brushes, layers and more to draw and paint.

Let's get started!
title: Art Fundamentals: Digital Art Tools Essentials
